Literature.Title: Short, mirror-symmetric antimicrobial peptides centered on "RRR" have broad-spectrum antibacterial activity with low drug resistance and toxicity.
Literature.Author: Zhang F, Yang P, Mao W, Zhong C, Zhang J, Chang L, Wu X, Liu H, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µM,Chinese hamster ovary cells CHO-K1:IC50=61.35 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM)
